name: .GRV File Extension
summary: Learn about .GRV files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File used by Microsoft Office Groove, a collaboration program used in professional environments; contains account information or a Groove invitation; used for logging into Groove or inviting associates and co-workers to view a document or Web page.

content: GRV files are stored in an XML format.
NOTE: GRV files were previously used to store Groove tool, template, or workspace information.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
